summary: GRRM just released a new post on his blog saying that the ending of GoT and his books will actually be very different. So that’s...
question: GRRM just released a new post on his blog saying that the ending of GoT and his books will actually be very different. So that’s good at least.
answer:
Is that the yes and no one? It felt like he said the end is the same, just the way there is different. Why would I care? Its the end that I hate. I cant be bothered with his trolling. Hes not going to reveal what I would need to bother, so Ill just walk out. No point in staying. Its sad that I saw right through the amazing (not) Danielle is evil and still hate what he did for it.

Jon’s last stretch of the story with danielle is too shit and his end is too bitter. She completely destroyed him and he didnt deserve this. And GRRM would do something similar because he says the endgame is the same and that means Jon exiled at the Wall. I am so offended and Jon isnt my fav. Ive cried because of this. I cry a lot as I have a sensitive soul but I dont usually cry in fiction, because you know it’s fiction and it’s not real. Last time was when I watched the little mermaid when i was still 7. I hate it because she left her father. I love a good family story.

I read and saw Jon’s stuff from the beginning and I was always slightly bored. But he was a decent boy, always tried to do the right thing. He just wanted to be accepted and loved, wished for going back to Winterfell to his family more than anything. It was boring, but wtv. I rolled my eyes at him, always brooding. In the end, some bitch from hell comes and destroys him with some shit abusive romance who was never real, then he gets exiled to a place he was never happy in for doing the right thing which is kill her hitler with tits arse. Im not even going to comment on the rest, I am assuming most of it is D&D creative crap, but that would make it even worse. He was a generic boring boy, why would the author do this to him? In headcanon its fixed like in two weeks. But why? WHY? HE ISNT EVEN MY FAVOURITE CHARACTER AND IM SO UPSET.

Sansa, alone in Winterfell without a semblance of the girl she was. She wanted to go back home and be with Lady and her family. She is all alone with her bannermen. Who chose her because their preferred king was punished and sent to the wall. She is queen in the north so this is ½ of what I wanted for her.

Arya going in adventures, I like. Its also 1/” of what I wanted for her, to be free to be who she wanted. But she also wanted to go home and be with her family and SHE IS NOT and by sailing east she is saying bye bye for like a decade. Someone who sent half of her time going home and another half trying to Forget what home was, but never managing to.

Bran is still robot!Bran. I have no idea why people who are fans of him are happy with his ending. Its not Bran. Its the Three Eyes Raven. Bran is like in 5% the corner of his mind. If it was Bran it would be fine. He is not’. The books may be different but he is still surrounded by shit snakes (only Sam is worthy it).

Theon and Jaime died with 50% of their redemption done. Ive seen comics for kids doing redemption arcs better.

Cersei deserved surviving the lizard bitch but she had the best ending despite that. She died with whom she loved. She is the one I’m at most peace with.

What am I supposed to re-read this for? Every time I read Theon being mutilated, I’m reminded he dies without happiness? Every time Jon angsts about not being a Stark and that he wishes he was one, how he just wanted his old times back, I’m reminded they destroyed him and of his bitter end? Every time Sansa thinks about romance and gets her hopes dashed again and again, I’m reminded of her lonely end? Every time Arya thinks about her family and that is what keeps her core intact, I‘m reminded that her end is leaving her family? Every time Bran is thinking about how he misses his family, I’m reminded that he disappears to become someone else. What for?

I re-read and re-watch LORD OF THE RINGS because it’s a good story! It makes me smile. What of ASOIAF / GoT

NO!

summary: So I’m working on a Gendrya fic, guys!
body:
So I’m working on a Gendrya fic, guys!

I won’t be posting it for a while - give me a couple of weeks or so - and a title is still TBC.  It’s an AU inspired by/based on this post here (gotta give credit where credit is due).  

It’s been a long time since I did fanfiction (and never GOT before), so please bear with me. Below is my current working summary. 

All Gendry had to do was keep his head down, blend in, work hard, and not draw any unwanted attention.  He was a nobody here, just a stable hand, barely worth a second glance. That was the deal he had made, and Gendry knew his place.  He could not betray Ned Stark’s trust, not for anything, not for anyone, and especially not for his daughter.  He was a dead man walking, and, if the time came, there was only a very slim chance he would make it out alive.  It was too dangerous for him to fall in love, and especially with her. It was just sod’s law that his heart didn’t want to listen. 

Once I start posting, I hope you guys enjoy.  Thoughts would be appreciated on whether, based on the summary, it would be something you’d potentially be interested in reading. 

Cheers!

summary: I’m actually upset that Arya isn’t the one who killed Cersei in the finale of Game of Thrones. The Lannisters have been...
body:
I’m actually upset that Arya isn’t the one who killed Cersei in the finale of Game of Thrones. The Lannisters have been threatening and hurting the Starks since the beginning of the series, so I had really imagined Arya killing Cersei as some sort of revenge for what she did to her family and to her. Plus, Arya had already planned to kill her, I would’ve loved to see that final confrontation, it was just meant to happen. Arya finding Cersei and killing her would’ve been WAY better than Cersei dying in Jaime’s arms because Daenerys is burning everything. I know that Daenerys and Cersei were ennemies, but not as much as Arya and Cersei were. Arya saw her entire family suffer because of Cersei’s since years, while Daenerys and Cersei only saw each other once, and Cersei hurt Daenerys way less than she hurt Arya. 

Do not get me wrong : I’m not complaining about Cersei being dead, I’m complaining about the way she died and the person responsible for her death. It is unfair that she got to have a long talk with her brother and tell him she loved him before dying, while the good - as in nice - characters didn’t get that. Ned Stark was unfairly accused and then brutally beheaded before he could even look at his children for one last time, Missandei was killed the same way after suffering all her life, Catelyn Stark died thinking all of her family was dead and seeing one of her sons being stabbed… I know it’s fiction, but the writers could’ve done better. Like, something else than letting an incestuous and cruel couple reuniting before dying in each other’s arms. 

Sorry if this post is messy and poorly written, I had many ideas but had a hard time making them fit together and sound good. If you agree tell me in the comments, I like to talk about Game of Thrones

body:
How it should be:

Tyrion: I know you don’t want it but if I ask, you would be?

Bran: No.

Tyrion: But

Bran: I will be part of the council but I can’t be king I am the three eyed raven. But I can tell you who will. History repeats itself, sometimes the choices we made cost lifes, sometimes it saves lifes, it depends on the choice… and in this place theres only one man who deserves the throne for line succession, since King Roberts dead there was never a rightful king, Joffrey and Tommen were Lannisters and Cersei was cruel, so we will let the history advance like it should be years ago and we will choose the rightful king, the real Robert Baratheon son, Gendry Baratheon.

Gendry: I… can’t do this I… I don’t know how

Bran: You don’t need to know how to rule, that’s your hands work the only thing we need is just a woman and an honorable man

- Tyrion smiles to hear that reference, Bran move his eyes to his younger sister-

Bran: I know you said you are not a Lady and that’s true you never be a Lady you will be a Queen

Arya: Bran I… can’t i don’t know how to rule and I…

Bran: What? Marry? You love him and he loves you, that’s enough to united the kingdoms, we are gonna close the history as it begans how it should began with Lyanna Stark and Robert Baratheon but this time is gonna be Arya Stark and Gendry Baratheon, long may their reign!

Everyone: Long may their reign.

Bran: And you will be their hand Tyrion

Tyrion: I can’t I…

Bran: I dont want to listen one “I can’t” more, you will I know you can, I saw it, all of you… this time we will do things right.

- Everyone cheers meanwhile Gendry and Arya smiles at each other-

Gendry: So you will be my Queen?

Arya: No stupid bullhead. I will be your family.


Maybe someone can make a more elaborated fanfic about this, I would describe more but english is not my first language so grammar…

summary:
chaos / rich!arya & stablemaster!gendry
You look so good in the shoes of an outcast
I kissed your throat every time they said it...
body:
chaos / rich!arya & stablemaster!gendry
You look so good in the shoes of an outcast
I kissed your throat every time they said it wouldn’t last
But then I knew you, I knew you, I knew you
I really knew you

summary: Now that I’ve rejected canon I’m just sitting here giggling that Joe got paid to come back on set and make heart eyes at Maisie...
body:
Now that I’ve rejected canon I’m just sitting here giggling that Joe got paid to come back on set and make heart eyes at Maisie for five episodes and swing a hammer a couple of times.

Dream job.

blog.name: bonesgadh
blog.title: Another Arya Stark Stan
blog.description: Just a girl who is obsessed with many things: Star Wars, Game of Thrones, Harry Potter, Bones, Pitch Perfect, La La Land, Desperate Housewives, Stranger Things, Friends, HIMYM, Orange Is The New Black, The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, The Hunger Games. Cheese addict. Dog lover. Disney and Pixar crazy fan. Pretty decent cook. 🇲🇽. Proud Gryffindor. Broadway Freak. Drummer. I write stuff, mostly fanfiction. Rey Solo theorist. I love all sports. Main ships: Booth & Brennan, Gendrya, Ross & Rachel, Jeca, Everlark, Merder, Mileven, Damerey, Harmione. I have a slightly unhealthy obsession with Julie Andrews and I love John Williams beyond all things. Current state: waiting for Stranger Things 3.

summary: I can totally picture Arya returning to Westeros after her Rumspringa-like trip around the known world with her hair down to her...
body:
I can totally picture Arya returning to Westeros after her Rumspringa-like trip around the known world with her hair down to her hip, five or six tattoos, sunglasses, a joint in her hand, a few more scars to add to her collection and cursing like a sailor.

And Gendry would still look at her as if she were the only girl in the world.

summary:
I mean....Sansa is everything Catelyn Stark would have wanted Sansa to be. 
Sansa:
Oh, you want to sail west, Arya?  Here, take...
body:
I mean….Sansa is everything Catelyn Stark would have wanted Sansa to be.

Sansa:

Oh, you want to sail west, Arya? Here, take a Stark ship and some able bodies.

Oh, you are staying in the snakepit that is King’s Landing, Bran? I’ll just allow my sword sworn out of her oath to head your kingsguard. She’s like …the only trustworthy nonStark. You’ll be fine, and she is gonna lose her shit at this title and opportunity. Bless both of you.

Meanwhile sansa is handling her shit in the north like nobody’s business, and looking fierce.

Family. Duty. Honor indeed.

Meanwhile sansa is handling her shit in the north like nobody’s business, and looking fierce.

Family. Duty. Honor indeed.

summary: Wouldn’t it be super cute if Nymeria decided to go on a little road trip to Storm’s End and spent her time chasing off girls who...
body:
Wouldn’t it be super cute if Nymeria decided to go on a little road trip to Storm’s End and spent her time chasing off girls who want Arya’s man and chilling with Gendry while they both wait for Arya to come home.

‘Cause like this might be my new headcanon.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: Just realized, since Arya is going west of Westeros, she’s gonna hit the ASoIaF equivalent of the Americas. Also, the ASoIaF...
body:
Just realized, since Arya is going west of Westeros, she’s gonna hit the ASoIaF equivalent of the Americas. Also, the ASoIaF encyclopedia doesn’t have an equivalent to the Americas so we honestly know nothing about what she’ll encounter.

Because, last time I checked, Westeros is Europe, Essos is the Middle East / South Asia, Sothoryos is Africa, and Yi Ti is East Asia. So…what the heck is the gritty fantasy version of the Americas gonna look like?
